code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8080/api';const courseService={async getAllCourses(){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/courses"));return response.data;},async getCourseById(id){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/courses/").concat(id));return response.data;},async createCourse(courseData){const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/courses"),courseData);return response.data;},async updateCourse(id,courseData){const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/courses/").concat(id),courseData);return response.data;},async deleteCourse(id){const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/courses/").concat(id));return response.data;},async getCoursesByTeacher(teacherId){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/courses/teacher/").concat(teacherId));return response.data;}};export default courseService;
